Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| --- |
| Normal singleton pregnancies (complication: healthy) |

Note: In this context, "normal" and "healthy" are used to describe the absence of disease or complications. However, for clarity, I have included them in the table as qualifiers to distinguish these conditions from diseases.
